NewsItem.HEADLINE: RAN Expert INSIGHT 2017.1 Video Entertainment
NewsItem.SUMMARY: This strategic report investigates the end market for mobile data, and how "data" is dominated by the video entertainment business
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The cable market now sells data, not television. The mobile market also has moved from voice calls to data. There's a direct conflict between the two markets now, and as a result the video entertainment market is becoming a major influence on the mobile industry. This strategic report examines the impact.
